marcus100868 Thank You For uploading this, I've been wanting this since the show. Not sure if I have a codec problem or what. The picture is perfect but the sound is continuously jittery. Never had any problems with MKv in the past. ??????? Please
Hi CSNYguy what player are you using on your pc?

I always use Vlc player and it works fine i always check my files before i upload them could be a codec problem not sure but usually i stream my mkv files with twonky server to my home theater and never have any problems even with my dts hd master audio try checking your audio codecs let me know how you go.
Regards Marcus100868
